problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): During the game between the Nigerian team and the British team, play had to be stopped because a melee had broke out within one set of fans. 8 fans were arrested for unruly behaviour, apparently some words were exchanged which got heated very quickly. The fans in question were all actually Nigerian and picked a fight between themselves in the heat of the moment.
Question: Which set of fans caused the ruckus?
ans0: Unknown
ans1: The Nigerian fans
ans2: The British fans
